bug.author: Vafilor
bug.summary: Bug: label filter skips identical keys with different values.
bug.description:
If you have two labels like:
accuracy: 98 accuracy: 99
and you choose accuracy: 98 the other one will not show up in the list anymore. It should. This is because we skip labels with identical keys, but it should be identical key/values.

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label kind/bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.84. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/onepanelio/core>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.

Actually, this is not an issue. You can not add two labels with different values to the same object. E.g. you can not have
accuracy: 98 accuracy: 99
on the same object. So the current behavior is correct.
